Sentencas: The performance of a Victorian brown coal with minimal pre-treatment was assessed in a solid oxide electrolyte based direct carbon fuel cell (DCFC) at 700 and 800 degrees C.
Titulo: Direct carbon fuel cell operation on brown coal

Sentencas: In order to evaluate the effect of inherent inorganic species in the coal on the electrochemical performance of DCFCs (voltage - power density current density), characteristics of button cells fuelled with raw and acid washed (demineralised) coal were compared along with commercially available XC72 carbon black.
Titulo: Direct carbon fuel cell operation on brown coal

Sentencas: Peak power densities of 65 and 67 mW cm(-2) were observed for demineralised coal char and carbon black respectively at 800 degrees C, whereas the raw coal char achieved a superior power density of 89 mW cm(-2).
Titulo: Direct carbon fuel cell operation on brown coal

Sentencas: The availability of reactive species at the anode, namely CO, is believed to be the primary differentiator of cell performance, and is related to variations in the physical and chemical makeup of carbon fuels.
Titulo: Direct carbon fuel cell operation on brown coal

Sentencas: The reactivity of these fuels in the presence of CO2 to generate CO (and power) via Boudouard gasification was assessed in the 700-800 degrees C temperature range via thermogravimetric analysis.
Titulo: Direct carbon fuel cell operation on brown coal
